text:
“Journalists have been murdered before in this country, and they will be again. But this murder was different..because the violence extended to his wife & children.”

- It’s 5 years today.

(The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack.)

https://harpers.org/blog/2014/03/death-at-the-serena/ … via @Harpers
author: MujMash

text:
طالبا "فقط شايد بتانن آلات موسيقي ماره بشكنانن. شايد ماره نمانن كه كار كنيم. 

امااز مغز و دل ما موسيقي ره كشيده نميتانن. چون موسيقي حال در رگ رگ ماس."

- نگين خپلواك
author: MujMash

text:
"...براى رسيدن به صدايى كه اينگونه به دل مي نشيند چى دل هايى كه خون شده...تا دست يافتن به اين هارمونى از هفت خوان نابرابرى ها گذشته اند."

@SuhrabSirat
author: MujMash

text:
And this’s remarkable in many ways - least being that Dr. Mohib had just returned as ambassador to US where he built contacts & relationships. 
But also: who will be doing the top diplomacy if the president’s NSA is “frozen out” & his foreign minister - well, he doesnt trust much
author: MujMash

text:
Puts president Ghani in a very tough spot, if true.

On the one hand is a central member of his team who’s been with him from beginning. On the other is the relationship with US, still central to him despite this rough, frustrating patch.
author: MujMash
MujMash
